text: I want to be able to extract deals and the products they are associated with. Unfortunately, I know there is no built-in product to deal association. Any thoughts on how this can be done?

To do this you have use the CRM Associations API and pull a list of Line Items using Association ID 19 Deals to Line Items.  Then you can use the Line Items API to get the Product ID by the Line Item Object ID.

:wave::skin-tone-6:  we are in the process of introducing a new refreshed CMS API into private beta and we are looking for volunteers to participate.
Currently we have the following just about ready to go:
• CMS Domains 
• CMS URL Redirects 
• CMS Site Site search
If you are interested in participating in the private Beta please fill out this google form. (<https://forms.gle/iwjunTUNwZPD7g1y6>) Thank you :pray:
The beta apis can include associations when you get objects, so you might be able to cut out some calls that way
